DOC.brief_summary: In prospective , observational study investigator assess perioperative course right ventricular function combination venous return patient undergo major non-cardiac surgery . The study aim investigate patient undergo major non-cardiac surgery develop impairment right ventricular function and/or venous return . Furthermore , study evaluates impairment right ventricular function and/or venous return associate leave ventricular function , arterial side circulation postoperative clinical outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Perioperative Assessment Right Ventricular Function Venous Return Patients With Epithelial Ovarian Cancer Undergoing Cytoreductive Surgery ( Gyn Right ) - Pilot Study
